title: Real Life Snapchat Filters
detail: Bring your favorite filters to life with facial projection mapping!
extended_details: Snapchat’s filters, or Lenses, have become a ubiquitous part of social media. Our project aims to bring them to life using a camera for face detection and real time tracking and a projector for 3d projection mapping directly onto faces. We will also incorporate several of our own mask designs and visuals.

parts_and_costs.part: Amazon.com: Pro HD Webcam 1080P Widescreen Video with Microphone for W
